verses.verse: Likewise this <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the trespass offering: <S%H817><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is most holy. <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%>

In the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> they kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> shall they kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> the trespass offering: <S%H817><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall he sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof; <S%H853><s%> the rump, <S%H451><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%>

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on <S%H5921><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> the flanks, <S%H3689><s%> and the caul <S%H3508><s%> that is above <S%H5921><s%> the liver, <S%H3516><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> it shall he take away: <S%H5493><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> for an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a trespass offering. <S%H817><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> thereof: it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is most holy. <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%>

As the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> is, so is the trespass offering: <S%H817><s%> there is one <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> for them: the priest <S%H3548><s%> that <S%H834><s%> maketh atonement <S%H3722><s%> therewith shall have <S%H1961><s%> it.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> any man's <S%H376><s%> burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> even the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> to himself the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath offered. <S%H7126><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is baked <S%H644><s%> in the oven, <S%H8574><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is dressed <S%H6213><s%> in the frying pan, <S%H4802><s%> and in <S%H5921><s%> the pan, <S%H4227><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> the priest's <S%H3548><s%> that offereth <S%H7126><s%> it.

And every <S%H3605><s%> meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and dry, <S%H2720><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> have, <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H376><s%> as much as another. <S%H251><s%>
And this <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> he offer <S%H7126><s%> it for <S%H5921><s%> a thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and cakes <S%H2471><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> of fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> fried. <S%H7246><s%>

Besides <S%H5921><s%> the cakes, <S%H2471><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> for his offering <S%H7133><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> of his peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

And of <S%H4480><s%> it he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> one <S%H259><s%> out of the whole <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> oblation <S%H7133><s%> for a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> the priest's <S%H3548><s%> that sprinkleth <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> for thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> that it is offered; <S%H7133><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> leave <S%H5117><s%> any of <S%H4480><s%> it until <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his offering <S%H7133><s%> be a vow, <S%H5088><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a voluntary offering, <S%H5071><s%> it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> that he offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sacrifice: <S%H2077><s%> and on the morrow <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> also the remainder <S%H3498><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it shall be eaten: <S%H398><s%>

But the remainder <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> any of the flesh <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> be eaten at all <S%H398><s%> <S%H398><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be accepted, <S%H7521><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall it be imputed <S%H2803><s%> unto him that offereth <S%H7126><s%> it: it shall be <S%H1961><s%> an abomination, <S%H6292><s%> and the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> that <S%H834><s%> toucheth <S%H5060><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing shall not <S%H3808><s%> be eaten; <S%H398><s%> it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> and as for the flesh, <S%H1320><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that be clean <S%H2889><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> thereof. <S%H1320><s%>

But the soul <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> that <S%H834><s%> pertain unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, even that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%>

Moreover the soul <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> shall touch <S%H5060><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing, as the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> or <S%H176><s%> any unclean <S%H2931><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> or <S%H176><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> abominable <S%H8263><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing, and eat <S%H398><s%> of the flesh <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> which <S%H834><s%> pertain unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> no manner <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of fat, <S%H2459><s%> of ox, <S%H7794><s%> or of sheep, <S%H3775><s%> or of goat. <S%H5795><s%>

And the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the beast that dieth of itself, <S%H5038><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of that which is torn with beasts, <S%H2966><s%> may be used <S%H6213><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> other use: <S%H4399><s%> but ye shall in no wise eat <S%H3808><s%> <S%H398><s%> <S%H398><s%> of it.

For <S%H3588><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the beast, <S%H929><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> <S%H4480><s%> men offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> it shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%>

Moreover ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> no manner <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> whether it be of fowl <S%H5775><s%> or of beast, <S%H929><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> of your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that <S%H834><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> any manner <S%H3605><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> even that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> He that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

His own hands <S%H3027><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the offerings of the LORD made by fire, <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the breast, <S%H2373><s%> it shall he bring, <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> that the breast <S%H2373><s%> may be waved <S%H5130><s%> <S%H853><s%> for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%> but the breast <S%H2373><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> and his sons'. <S%H1121><s%>

And the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> shall ye give <S%H5414><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> for a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the sacrifices <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2077><s%> of your peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

He among the sons <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> and the fat, <S%H2459><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> for his part. <S%H4440><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and the heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> have I taken <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from off the sacrifices <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2077><s%> of their peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> and have given <S%H5414><s%> them unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and unto his sons <S%H1121><s%> by a statute <S%H2706><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the portion of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> out of the offerings of the LORD made by fire, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when he presented <S%H7126><s%> them to minister unto the LORD in the priest's office; <S%H3547><s%> <S%H3068><s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be given <S%H5414><s%> them of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he anointed <S%H4886><s%> them, by a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> of the meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and of the trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> and of the consecrations, <S%H4394><s%> and of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offerings; <S%H8002><s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> their oblations <S%H7133><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
